definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
to turn back/to backtrack/(fig.) to revert to the former way of doing things
the road back to where one came from

sentences.english: I walk slowly, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 也许走得慢点儿，可我绝不会走回头路。

sentences.english: I am a slow walker, but I never walk back.
sentences.chinese: 我走的不快，但绝不走回头路。

sentences.english: Yet now I was going back.
sentences.chinese: 然而我开始走回头路了。

sentences.english: Once you've experienced the beauty of Chinese women, there is no going back.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你经历了中国女性美，就没有回头路。

sentences.english: Once you start, don't look back.
sentences.chinese: 一旦开始流程后，就不要走回头路。

sentences.english: And then we walked down and visited the swan lake and grass lake.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们再走回头路，参观了天鹅海和芳草海。

sentences.english: Consequently, we reached a situation where it's quite impossible to come back.
sentences.chinese: 自然的，以我们现在的形势不能再走回头路了。

sentences.english: I paid the fee in one lump sum and I told myself, "No turning back".
sentences.chinese: 我付了费，一笔过，我告诉自己，“不会走回头路”。

sentences.english: You have to look forward, because life will not go back.
sentences.chinese: 你得朝前看，因为生命不会走回头路。

sentences.english: I'd like my hair parting a little up .
Unfortunately, this is a one-way street to problems with your sex life.
sentences.chinese: 很不幸，对于你的性生活的问题没有回头路。

sentences.english: Gorbachev’s reforms either were ignored or they were enacted with perverse consequences.
sentences.chinese: 戈尔巴乔夫的改革要么被忽略，要么走回头路。

sentences.english: Never look back unless you want to go that way.
sentences.chinese: 不要回头望，除非想走回头路。

sentences.english: In a true friendship, there's always a way back.
sentences.chinese: 在真正的友谊中，通常是有回头路的。

sentences.english: Would you part my hair in the middle, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把我的头路分在中间好吗？

definition: the area north of the Great Wall
side street/road branching from the main street
port/flat land next to a river or ocean
Qiaotou or Chiaotou township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
either end of a bridge/a bridgehead
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish
